articles.description: George Russell says Mercedes are talking to world champion Max Verstappen about signing him for next season.
articles.title: George Russell says Max Verstappen is talking to Mercedes over potential 2026 move

articles.description: Interviews with substituted players and camera access to dressing rooms will feature in Premier League TV coverage next season.
articles.title: Premier League: Touchline interviews with substituted players set to begin next season

articles.description: Lando Norris leads team-mate and title rival Oscar Piastri to a McLaren one-two in Friday practice at the Austrian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix: Lando Norris quickest ahead of Oscar Piastri in Friday practice

articles.description: Lyon are included in the Ligue 1 fixtures for next season despite being demoted to France's second tier because of poor finances.
articles.title: Lyon included in Ligue 1 fixtures for 2025-26 despite demotion to second tier

articles.description: Brentford appoint Keith Andrews as their new head coach to replace Thomas Frank, who joined Tottenham earlier in June.
articles.title: Brentford appoint Keith Andrews as Thomas Frank's successor

articles.description: Iga Swiatek reaches a first WTA Tour grass-court final with a crushing victory over Wimbledon runner-up Jasmine Paolin at Bad Homburg.
articles.title: Iga Swiatek reaches first grass-court final with victory over Jasmine Paolini in Bad Homburg; Alexandra Eala reaches Eastbourne final

articles.description: England's managing director of men's cricket Rob Key discusses Jofra Archer's importance to the Test side and acknowledges the risk of the fast bowler's return.
articles.title: Jofra Archer: England quick can 'create a legacy' in Test cricket, says Rob Key

articles.description: British qualifier Oliver Tarvet calls for a change in United States college rules after being unable to take home his full Wimbledon prize money.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: British qualifier Oliver Tarvet calls for change in NCAA prize money rule

articles.description: Nottingham-born centre Williams is selected to join the Boston Celtics as the number 46 pick in the second round of the 2025 NBA draft.
articles.title: NBA: Great Britain's Amari Williams drafted by Boston Celtics

articles.description: Steve Bunce runs the rule over the weekend's fights, with Deontay Wilder and Jake Paul at the top of a double-header.
articles.title: Wilder fight: Jake Paul and Deontay Wilder could be a fight in the future, says Steve Bunce
